Class UserManagement

java.lang.Object

      com.ibm.achievement.service.UserManagement

public class UserManagement
extends org.springframework.web.context.support.SpringBeanAutowiringSupport

The UserManagement class provide services like user validation, user registration , retrieve user data. All methods are exposed as web services

isValidUser

public EmployeeVO isValidUser(java.lang.String emailId,
                              java.lang.String password)
                       throws AchievementTrackerException
This method is used to validate user for login and return the user roll. If user roll is null that means user in not valid.

Parameters:
emailAddress - (required) user email address
password - (required) user password, length must have to be between 8 to 12
Returns:
String if user registered return user role
Throws:
AchievementTrackerException

registerUser

public boolean registerUser(EmployeeVO employeeVO,
                            java.lang.String password)
                     throws AchievementTrackerException
This method is called to register new user, if registration operation successful return true or return false

Parameters:
employeeVO - details information of user, project etc
password - user password
Returns:
after successful registration return true else false
Throws:
AchievementTrackerException

findUserByActiveFlag

public java.util.List<EmployeeVO> findUserByActiveFlag(java.lang.String activeFlag)
                                                throws AchievementTrackerException
This method is used to find user having active flag Y and return the list

Parameters:
activeFlag - active flag Y or inactive flag N
Returns:
list of EmployeeVO List of active user
Throws:
AchievementTrackerException

Return true if user active flag update successful or return false

Parameters:
activeFlag - if approved Y or N
emailId - user mail address
